seo.title: About Me | Daniel Sepúlveda | FullStack Developer
seo.description: In this page you will find some information about me. If you want to know something not mentioned, don't hesitate in send me a message.

boxes.title: Introduction
points: My name is Daniel Sepúlveda, and I am a Full Stack web developer with knowledge of MERN Stack. My interest in constantly learning new things, together with the search for a change in my work life, led me to this programming world and I found a passion in it. Fortunately, I can say that it was one of the best decisions I have ever made, since programming and being able to develop a product that solves a problem is something that makes me happy. I am currently looking for my first job in the IT world while I keep learning in a self-taught way.

boxes.title: Education
points: I did the Full Stack MERN and Mobile Apps programming Bootcamp at Mindhub, where we worked using Agile / Scrum methodology. I was able to develop several projects both in a group and individually, always meeting deadlines and holding feedback meetings. I also had the opportunity to work as a Team Leader in the two group projects that we had to develop.
